main event: A civilian woman observed a tan hurricane disk at 30,000 feet traveling at a very high speed over Chicago, Illinois.
interesting points: The report describes the object as a silver saucer-shaped object, about 40 to 50 feet in diameter, with blue-green lights traveling at 3,000 mph.
The object was observed for about 15 minutes, making a zigging motion in its flight path at a high rate of speed.
The sighting was reported on the 28th of July 1952 at 2015 CST, with the object making a path from Southwest to Northeast.
Weather conditions at the time were described as scattered clouds with no restriction to vision.
The report was sourced from a private citizen and was referred to the Project Blue Book Officer, Lieutenant Hamilton, for investigation.
